title: A Li·Meng Zhi Chengbao
synopsis: Living in the city of dreams, Ari has always dreamed of becoming a dream-picking hero. But in reality, Ari and his team members: the alarm clock and the paper man, are the ridiculous and incompetent squad in the dream catching team. One day, Ari accidentally collected the dream of a blind little girl, and the fate of the two began to be tied. However, just as Ali and the little girl became good friends, an unprecedented crisis also appeared in Dream City. So, can Ari become a hero who saves the city of dreams? What kind of fantasy journey will he and the little girl embark on? (translated from douban)
